item.title: ubuntu安装Qv2ray
item.description: replace your source with tuna speed up apt-update : https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/help/ubuntu/ this is for ubuntu , but igeuss it will working well on other linux machines too. download Qv2ray here: https://github.com/Qv2ray/Qv2ray/releases download v2ray-core here (linux-64 ver):https://github.com/v2ray/v2ray-core/releases before open Appimage file you should give it permission! : chmod 777 * set up subscribe follow this instruction :https://qv2ray.
